question: I have 4 daughters. Who will inherit from me?
answer:
QUESTION

If i have four daughter  after i died who will share my  property.  my  brohther had one son and one brother had one son

just for my knoweldge,, pls tell me it can give to my daughter pls reply

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh  

 

·         The Sharée ruling herein given is specifically based on the question posed and should be read in conjunction with the question.

·         The Darul Ifta bears no responsibility to any party who may or may not act on this answer. The Darul Ifta being hereby exempted from loss or damage howsoever caused.

If you pass away leaving behind four daughters, two brothers and two nephews, then your estate will be divided into six equal shares as follows:

 

Daughters [4]: one share each

Brothers [2]: one share each

 

The nephews will not inherit.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam u Alaikum
